title: Thunderbird and gmail accounts
content: I copied the Thunderbird profile to a new computer (has 2 gmail accounts and 1 other email account). They are using IMAP. How do I delete the 2 gmail accounts from Thunderbird on the old pc without affecting those accounts on the new computer? I don't want the gmail accounts on both computers.
creator: rdtsf85

title: Original text from emails disappears and is converted to random numbers and letters
content:
Hello recently, without any reason that I know, several emails received or sent are being lost. The original text disappears and is replaced by some random letters and texts. Plus, in one case the original text of one email replaced the original of other email from other person.

I decided to install Malwarebytes, and from time to time I get a warning about Thunderbird, I have no idea if is related.

There is anyone that can help to solve this? It is frustrating, because I use Thunderbird for my work accounts, and now I am losing emails that I need.

Thank you, Ricardo
creator: kado.jogos
